"This is a day of anxiety and sadness for the communities of Geelong and Broadmeadows." - PM
"The Government will be providing the most intensive form of employment assistance that we can provide" - PM
"For the workers at Ford and their families absorbing this difficult news today, we will make sure that you are not left behind." - PM
"Today I announce that we will be creating a fund to work in support of those communities." - PM
"The Federal Government will allocate $30 million to a fund, the Victorian Government will allocate $9 million to this fund" - PM
"today I call on Ford to make a substantial contribution to this fund as well." - PM
"I want to say to Australians that here in our nation we show time after time how good we are when we work together." - PM
"The economy that we have today has many sources of strength but the high $AUD is putting a lot of pressure on some industries" - PM

We are committed to our own religious and national traditions. We build modern state, modern Azerbaijan on this solid foundation.
The Azerbaijani state is loyal to its past. All religious monuments are restored and repaired in Azerbaijan.
The people of Azerbaijan respected and respected their respect for their sacred religion.
Over the past 10 years, over 200 mosques have been built in Azerbaijan, over 80 mosques have been repaired.
Imamzade Religious and Historical Architectural Monument Monument Restores Great Importance for Our People
Azerbaijan, as an independent state, also contributes to the Islamic solidarity.
We take practical steps to strengthen Islamic solidarity.
We must try to further strengthen Islamic solidarity and expand ties between Muslim countries.
Representatives of all religions functioning in Azerbaijan live and live as one family.
There has never been any confrontation or misunderstanding in Azerbaijan on religious or national grounds, and I am convinced that it will not.
Islam is a religion of mercy. We need to work hard and accurate information about Islam in the world with practical steps.
We are working hard and should work together to bring about the world of Islamic culture and its values.
In some cases, deliberate misinterpretation of Muslims and their role in the media's deepening.
Unfortunately, civil war is going on in different regions, blood flows from the blood. We can not afford it.
Today Azerbaijan is free, independent. Independent Azerbaijan is able to maintain its historical past and look confidently into the future.

Today marks the 50th anniversary of the Organisation of African Unity.
Let us celebrate the Jubilee by promoting peace, unity, dignity and prosperity in our beloved continent! Happy Africa Day to all!

We must not pay the price of the democracy of others so that we can preserve our democracy, and we will not strive to evade the elections.
Over the last decade, six of the world’s ten fastest growing economies were in Africa.
Africa is rising! Our time has indeed come. Happy Africa Day to all!

Establishing "ASAN service" is a manifestation of serious reforms in Azerbaijan.
This is a new system. This is a brand of Azerbaijan. This is innovation, modernity, the development of our country.
"ASAN Service" has several key areas of activity. Among them is a high level of service for people.
The activity of ASAN service is innovation, modernity, technology and knowledge.
Unpleasant situations are prevented through this system, and anti-corruption is even more effective (cont) http://t.co/jnu6E54x1L
The activities of volunteers in "ASAN Service" means the application of new rules of conduct in society. This is very (cont) http://t.co/IlSnmwddJ7

This service is well-coordinated with the overall development of our country. Today, the modern state in Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/Y0jcw9Z7rb
The world's most progressive, progressive experience is applied in Azerbaijan. This is generally our political line.
The advantage of "ASAN service" is that Azerbaijan is already applying modern technologies.
Other countries will learn and benefit from our experiences.
